outputs.output_descr: The overall goal of the project is to contribute to raising professional standard of the Georgian media and to support independent and impartial reporting as one of the factors for the consolidation of democracy in Georgia. The action will specifically address the problem of the domestic capacity to monitor media and provide competent and grounded quantitative and qualitative analysis regarding media performance. More specifically, the project aims to raise awareness of media regarding neutral & balanced coverage; developing skills and professional competence of the Georgian Public Broadcaster (GPB) and enhancing watchdog functions of civil society organizations by developing their media monitoring capacity.

The overall goal of the project is to contribute to raising professional standard of the Georgian media and to support independent and impartial reporting as one of the factors for the consolidation of democracy in Georgia. The action will specifically address the problem of the domestic capacity to monitor media and provide competent and grounded quantitative and qualitative analysis regarding media performance. More specifically, the project aims to raise awareness of media regarding neutral & balanced coverage; developing skills and professional competence of the Georgian Public Broadcaster (GPB) and enhancing watchdog functions of civil society organizations by developing their media monitoring capacity.

project_descr: Development of Media Monitoring Capacities in Georgia
project_title: Development of Media Monitoring Capacities in Georgia
